name: Matthew McConaughey

roles_affiliations: University of Texas at Austin (BS in Radio-Television-Film)
Golden Globe Award Winner (Best Actor - Motion Picture Drama)
structured_info.background: Born in Texas in 1969 and raised in Louisiana, McConaughey holds a Bachelor of Science degree from the University of Texas at Austin. Before his acting career, he explored various paths including professional football, legal assistance, and banking. His father was a businessman and football player.

summary: Matthew McConaughey is a celebrated American actor with a diverse background. He transitioned from a variety of early career paths, including professional football and teaching, after earning a degree from the University of Texas. He has achieved significant recognition in the film industry, including a Golden Globe Award.

name: James Donald McConaughey

roles_affiliations: University of Texas at Austin football team captain
structured_info.background: Born in Mississippi in 1929 and raised in Louisiana, James McConaughey was a wide receiver and captain of the University of Texas at Austin football team, later playing professionally for the Green Bay Packers. He transitioned to a career in the oil pipe supply business.

summary: James Donald McConaughey is a former football player and businessman, best known as the father of actor Matthew McConaughey. He excelled as a wide receiver and captain at the University of Texas at Austin and briefly played for the Green Bay Packers before entering the oil industry.

name: Jim McConaughey

structured_info.background: Jim McConaughey was drafted by the Green Bay Packers in 1953 and played professional football.

summary: Jim McConaughey is a former football player for the Green Bay Packers and is notably the father of actor Matthew McConaughey.

name: Dandridge McRae

structured_info.background: Dandridge McRae was a Confederate Brigadier General and a direct ancestor of actor Matthew McConaughey.

summary: Dandridge McRae was a Confederate Brigadier General with a notable familial connection as an ancestor of Academy Award-winning actor Matthew McConaughey.

name: Jason London

structured_info.background: Jason London is known for his role in the film *Dazed and Confused*, where he appeared alongside Matthew McConaughey.

summary: Jason London is an actor recognized for his work in *Dazed and Confused*.
